column4: anyone? how can I debug why when I log in to my ubuntu box via xdmcp I can see the gdm login prompt and login, but gnome doesn't start afterwards?
Does failsafe gnome or failsafe terminal work?
sorry, how do I select those when using xdmcp (via xming)? I am able to use the machine fine from a local login
I don't use XDMCP ( I always just do ssh -X ) so I am not very familiar with it, does it give you a standard GDM like you would get with a local login?
